body.name: OGX Extra Strength Refreshing Scalp + Teatree Mint , Invigorating Scalp Shampoo with Tea Tree & Peppermint Oil & Witch Hazel, Paraben/ Sulfate-Free Surfactants, 13 fl oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 33 mins
features: REFRESHING DEEP CLEANSE: This 13-fluid ounce bottle of OGX Extra Strength Refreshing Scalp + Teatree Mint Shampoo removes residue without stripping strands to refresh and reset strands
MINTY TINGLING SCALP SENSATION: The nourishing shampoo features a lightweight blend to deliver a long-lasting clean while leaving hair shiny, soft and hydrated with a healthy look and feel

HAIR CARE INSPIRED BY NATURE: Its unique formula is infused with tea tree oil to invigorate the scalp, peppermint extract to awaken the senses, and the natural astringent witch hazel to help remove buildup and nourish the scalp

ENGAGE THE SENSES: Experience a burst of freshness and a sweet peppermint, iced vanilla and tea tree scent for hair that smells fresh and invigorated. Plus the sulfate-free surfactant hair care system is paraben-free and gentle on your locks
REMOVES SCALP BUILDUP without stripping *vs non-conditioning shampoo; For optimal results use the Extra Strength Teatree Mint Shampoo & Conditioner
body.description: Re-energize your locks and invigorate your scalp with OGX Extra Strength Refreshing Scalp + Teatree Mint Shampoo. This nourishing shampoo features a lightweight formula designed to deeply cleanse hair with a burst of freshness and a long-lasting clean. Ideal for all moisture types, it's infused with tea tree oil and peppermint extract to help awaken the senses with a refreshing tingle, while witch hazel acts as a natural astringent to help remove buildup and nourish the scalp. This deep cleansing scalp shampoo also features a stimulating scent of sweet peppermint, iced vanilla and tea tree and leaves locks looking shiny and feeling soft. Paraben-free with sulfate-free surfactants, our scalp cleansing shampoo represents beauty, pure and simple. For best results and a minty fresh reset for your strands, use with Extra Strength Refreshing Scalp + Teatree Mint Conditioner and Scalp Treatment.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Refreshing Tea Tree Oil helps invigorate the scalp for a healthy-look and feel. Peppermint Extract helps awaken your senses with a refreshing tingle. And Witch Hazel is a natural astringent known to help remove buildup and nourish the scalp. Removes residue without stripping strands! Invigorate the scalp with a minty-tingle and indulge your senses in a burst of freshness. The lightweight formula of this scalp cleansing shampoo washes away residue without stripping strands for a deep cleanse and a long-lasting clean to re-energize your locks. Made with sulfate-free surfactants, this refreshing shampoo is also paraben-free and leaves behind an irresistible sweet peppermint and iced vanilla scent and shiny, hydrated tresses. With tea tree oil, peppermint and witch hazel Deeply cleanse with a burst of freshness Helps deliver a long-lasting clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Soothing and Invigorating Hair Care Experience
reviews.reviewText: The OGX Extra Strength Refreshing Scalp + Teatree Mint Shampoo has been a transformative addition to my hair care routine. This invigorating scalp shampoo, infused with tea tree, peppermint oil, and witch hazel, has provided my hair and scalp with a refreshing and soothing experience. I am thrilled to provide a five-star review for this remarkable hair care product.Invigorating Formula:One of the standout features of this shampoo is its invigorating formula. The combination of tea tree, peppermint oil, and witch hazel provides a refreshing and revitalizing sensation for both the hair and scalp.Sulfate-Free Surfactants:The fact that this shampoo is formulated with sulfate-free surfactants is a significant advantage. It ensures that it cleanses the hair effectively without stripping it of its natural oils, making it a gentle and safe choice for regular use.Soothing Scalp Care:This shampoo offers soothing scalp care, making it an ideal choice for individuals who deal with dryness, itching, or discomfort on the scalp. It provides relief and promotes a healthier scalp.Paraben-Free:The paraben-free formulation is a welcome feature. It means that the shampoo doesn't contain potentially harmful additives, providing a safer option for hair care.Refreshing Scent:The refreshing scent of tea tree and peppermint is invigorating and leaves the hair smelling clean and rejuvenated.Effective Cleansing:The shampoo effectively cleanses the hair, removing dirt, oil, and impurities, leaving it feeling fresh and revitalized.In conclusion, the OGX Extra Strength Refreshing Scalp + Teatree Mint Shampoo is a five-star hair care product that combines invigorating properties, sulfate-free surfactants, soothing scalp care, a paraben-free formulation, and a refreshing scent. Whether you're dealing with specific scalp concerns or simply want a revitalizing shampoo for a refreshing cleanse, this product delivers excellent results. I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone seeking a soothing and invigorating hair care experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo is amazing. I have an EXTREMELY dry itchy scalp, that is not helped by the fact that my nervous tick is picking or scratching at my scalp. Three washes with this has pretty much eradicated my scabs to where I’m not embarrassed to get a hair cut or have a hair dresser in my hair. My hair also feels SO soft and usually I have pretty coarse hair. I also use the ogx coconut shampoo and conditioner set, all three in my hair twice a week and omg. I’ve noticed a difference in like 2 weeks. I do let the tea tree shampoo set in my hair for a few minutes and it has really changed my hair. This was a last resort before I bought some crazy expensive products and I definitely won’t be doing that now. I also really love the fragrance and lather ability of this shampoo, it smells really minty but not overwhelmingly so, and it lathers up very well. My extension specialist gave it the ok for my extensions as well, so that’s nice and it’s waaaaaayyyyy more affordable than redkin or the from the salon stuff I was about to invest in 😩

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not as tingly as Paul Mitchell, TOO thick
reviews.reviewText: As others have mentioned, this isn't as tingly on your scalp as the salon brand- but it's much cheaper and easy to buy. I have long hair, so absolutely have to follow with intense conditioner or my hair is like straw. The thing I don't understand is why it is so thick, it's almost stiff it is so gelatinous. You need your hair to be absolutely dripping or you can't lather. I dispense in my palm, then put my head back under the shower so I can apply immediately. Have tried to water it down in the bottle with mixed results. I do love the smell and the tingly feeling. Makes your scalp feel really clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Have Been Enjoying for Years
reviews.reviewText: This is one of my staple favorites throughout the years(5 years to be exact). First, I LOVE the fragrance. To me, it smells like chocolate mint. (like peppermint chocolate ice cream). Second, the mint gives my scalp a real refreshing feeling and lastly, it does a beautiful job of cleaning my hair. Also, a little goes a long way...lasts a long time (depending on how ofter you shampoo your hair). Foot note: Use the conditioner on occasion, but it's rather diluted and doesn't last long. Shampoo: Competitive price...highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most HELPFUL Healing and Scent, too
reviews.reviewText: I ran into trouble with my scalp that absolutely nothing I tried over the course of many months did anything to heal. I learned that aloe vera can make rashes and wounds worse, not better, and most products made to soothe and heal are based on aloe vera and other oils that did me no good whatsoever, just exacerbated and prolonged the problem. My sister, living in a totally different climate, recommended this shampoo and conditioner and finally I tried it. It has done SO MUCH BETTER than anything else and I LOVE THE AROMA. The witch-hazel not only gives the it a more pure and fresh cleanse but also combines with the mint and tea tree to make it smell very similar sacred Palo Santo wood (slightly like sandalwood or very mild copal). With the companion conditioner, my hair is very soft, clean and fluffy and my scalp is the best it has been in over a year since this crazy problem started. I don't want anything else for my hair forever now!
